  • Classes in com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.requestheader used by com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.requestheader
    Class
    Description
    DefaultRequestHeaderContainer.Builder
    Implementation of the RequestHeaderContainer.Builder interface that is able to construct and manipulate DefaultRequestHeaderContainers.
    RequestHeaderContainer
    Represents an immutable container for multiple HTTP headers.
    RequestHeaderContainer.Builder
    Convenience class for constructing and manipulating RequestHeaderContainers.
    RequestHeaderFacade
    This class provides access to the RequestHeaderContainer for the current context.
